definitions.definition: The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs .
examples: The United States is in an awkward situation with debt default looming.

definitions.definition: The way in which something is positioned vis-à-vis its surroundings.
examples: The Botanical Gardens are in a delightful situation on the river bank.

definitions.definition: The place in which something is situated; a location .
Position or status with regard to conditions and circumstances .
A position of employment; a post .
A difficult or unpleasant set of circumstances; a problem .
examples: Boss, we've got a situation here…
She is working some sort of amazing burgundy chiffon situation with gold piping.

main_definition: The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs .
secondary_definitions: The way in which something is positioned vis-à-vis its surroundings.
The place in which something is situated; a location .
Position or status with regard to conditions and circumstances .
( UK ) A position of employment; a post .
A difficult or unpleasant set of circumstances; a problem .
( US , film industry ) An individual movie theater .
( slang ) An outfit , garment , or look .
